ygData.subject: Re: lifeleech quest!
ygData.msgSnippet: No shit! Throw us a bone here fellas, least tell us what the hell it is? (SK need some bones threw at them, that dont have a hidden 3x mana cost) This is the
ygData.messageBody:
No shit! Throw us a bone here fellas, least tell us what the hell it is?
(SK need some bones threw at them, that dont have a hidden 3x mana cost)
This is the first exciting thing Ive heard about our class, so least tell us
what the hell your talking about..
(if this is something that sucks i am gonna be pissed)

Morg
>
> Sounds kinda like SoulFire for sks except that it's not a sword, this is
> very cool indeed =)
> As much as everyone wants to details I can understand how you wouldn't
want
> to give them away.
> A few hints couldn't hurt tho hehe...
> And perhaps you could tells us just what the spell does, a lifetap
> obviously, but just how much life are we talking about here?
